titles.title: MP672 There is a name I love to hear (dup) (Five Verses)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a name I love to hear,
I love to speak its worth;
it sounds like music in my ear,
the sweetest name on earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It tells me if a Saviour's love,
who died to set me free;
it tells me of His precious blood,
the sinner's perfect plea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It tells of one whose loving heart
can feel my deepest woe,
who in my sorrow bears a part
that none can bear below.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
It bids my trembling heart rejoice,
It dries each rising tear;
it tells me in a 'still, small voice'
to trust and never fear.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus, the name I love so well,
the name I love to hear!
No saints on earth its worth can tell,
no heart conceive how dear!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O how I love the Saviour's name,
O how I love the Saviour's name
O how I love the Saviour's name,
the sweetest name on earth.
